contexts.context: ...as well as seals in the harmful, disease-laden <mark>weather</mark> called 'blight,' rings the volcano's outer slopes, and is...
...rain never falls and the sun never shines; the only <mark>weather</mark> is the red and deadly ash-blight.
In Skyrim, the cold <mark>weather</mark> and isolated terrain allow a few Necromancers to operate freely....
